name: Systems Down
description:
Your engine is damaged and you only have one power crystal left so you can only activate one system at a time (press one button).

W - thrust

A & D - rotate

S - shield

E - run life support

I had big plans for this game but ran out of time.  I was hoping to add another ship system (the scanner) that would show a diablo 3 style mini map.  This would have allowed the world to be much more open.  I also wanted to add:

- collectibles / power-ups

- story with dialogue

- art

- more monster types with more complex behaviour

- music
